title: Soundscapes for Survival Horror Music Pack
description: 11 seamlessly loopable dark ambient music tracks designed for horror, specifically survival horror games.
longDescription:
This pack contains 11 loopable dark ambient tracks and 33 mins, 27 secs of music designed for horror titles, particularly survival horror games like Resident Evil or Silent Hill. Every track is designed to be unobtrusive and versatile for different moments of gameplay - both peaceful and tense.


You can listen to the music pack in full before purchase here:

https://soundcloud.com/aleksis_tristan_shaw/sets/soundscapes-for-survival-horror


TRACKLIST

Haunted Loaded Screen (LOOP) [3:08]


Despairing Alone (LOOP) [4:47]


Deserted Village (LOOP) [2:44]


Scavenging in the Rain (LOOP) [1:39]


Carrion Everywhere (LOOP) [2:08]


Storm’s Coming (LOOP) [2:27]


Panic Room (Save Room Theme) LOOP [3:59]


Stalked (LOOP) [4:06]


An Inch from Death (LOOP) [2:44]


Barely Alive (LOOP) [3:54]


End Credits (LOOP) [1:46]
